titleStmt.title: Certain propositions of both Houses of Parliament concerning the raising of horse, horsemen, and arms, for the defence of the King and both Houses of Parliament together with divers instructions concerning the same.
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Parliament.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for E. Husbands and J. Frank and are to be sold at their shops ...,

notesStmt.note: "Lunæ, 19 September, 1642. Ordered that these instructions and the former propositions ... be printed and sent into the several counties ... of this kingdom, by the committee for the propositions. H. Elsynge, Cler. Parl. D. Com."
Reproduction of the original in the Harvard University Library.
